mapper.select: SELECT id FROM t_region WHERE region_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{regionName}, '%')

SELECT id, parent_id, region_name FROM (SELECT t1.id, t1.region_name, t1.parent_id, IF (find_in_set(parent_id, @pids) > 0, @pids := concat(@pids, ',', id), -1) AS ischild FROM (SELECT id, parent_id, region_name FROM t_region) t1, (SELECT @pids := #{regionId}) t2) t3 WHERE ischild != -1;
